books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In County Mayo, evil and witchcraft complicate a long-simmering romance; Book 3 of the Cousins O’Dwyer trilogy.
books.name: BLOOD MAGICK

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved both in real people’s lives and in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: An exploration of the world of Auri, a character in the Kingkiller Chronicles.
books.name: THE SLOW REGARD OF SILENT THINGS

books.author: by Clive Cussler
books.description: Dirk Pitt becomes involved in a post-Castro power struggle in Cuba.
books.name: HAVANA STORM

books.author: by Anne Rice
books.description: The Vampire Chronicles continue after a long hiatus with the reappearance of Lestat de Lioncourt.
books.name: PRINCE LESTAT

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After searching for her mother, who has disappeared, for more than 10 years, a woman employs a psychic and a detective.
books.name: LEAVING TIME

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description:
A German aristocrat, fleeing the Nazis, settles in America with a gift of eight purebred horses
from his closest friend.
books.name: PEGASUS

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: A former N.F.L. player and a single mom work together on a holiday toy drive and try to keep their friendship from turning into more.
books.name: YOURS FOR CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: The 15th book in the No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency series.
books.name: THE HANDSOME MAN'S DE LUXE CAFÉ

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Dognappers and a murdered reporter draw the attention of the Minnesota investigator Virgil Flowers.
books.name: DEADLINE

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, two classmates return to their North Carolina town for a funeral.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Mary Balogh
books.description: Flavian, a wounded survivor of the Napoleonic wars, and Agnes, a young widow, begin an unlikely courtship.
books.name: ONLY ENCHANTING

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett, back in New York City, investigates a peculiar crime in Harlem.
books.name: BURN
